name: Bugger!
short_description: "Bugger!" is a little debugging-themed "top-down shooter" game. The player takes on the role of a programmer trying to clear bugs out of a project using an array of pun-y weapons. I need to put this on hold for a while, so I'm posting the source in the meantime. Never fear though, I'll be back ;-) Requires SFML 1.6 to compile/run, but tinyxml source-code is included with the project.
